mapper.select: SELECT lod.idx, lod.lodging_name, keep.lodging_num, lod.addr,re.clean_grade, re.accuracy_grade, re.communication_grade, re.location_grade, re.check_in_grade, re.cost_grade FROM keeping keep JOIN lodging lod ON keep.lodging_num = lod.lodging_num JOIN review re ON keep.lodging_num = re.lodging_num WHERE keep.user_id = #{userId} and keep.delete_yn = 'N'
